rumpole.heading: Introducing IST Legal
rumpole.text1: IST Legal is an advanced artificial intelligence platform that revolutionizes legal operations through intelligent automation. Tailored for contemporary law firms, IST Legal is adept at simplifying intricate legal procedures and empowering legal practitioners to prioritize delivering superior client satisfaction by enhancing efficiency, precision, and outcomes.

team.heading: The team behind IST Legal Rwanda
team.text1: As the co-founder of two leading tech companies Academic Bridge and KudiBooks, Mariam has been at the forefront of innovation, particularly in integrating AI to transform the education and legal sectors. Her entrepreneurial journey began even before completing her Computer Science degree from the University of Rwanda in 2015, driven by a passion for leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. In her role as CEO of both Academic Bridge and KudiBooks, Mariam has successfully navigated the complexities of business operations, product development, and market expansion. Under her leadership, these ventures have evolved into pioneering platforms that empower educators, students, and businesses.
team.text2: At IST Legal, she’s spearheading the use of AI to automate and streamline legal processes, providing scalable solutions for law firms and legal departments. Her broader vision is to build a self-sustained African tech ecosystem, where homegrown AI-powered solutions drive transformative change. Mariam's commitment to innovation and strategic leadership continues to shape the future of tech entrepreneurship in Africa and beyond.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can you input sensitive data on the platform ?
faq.a11: In the Legal Q&A Module, different AI engines are used from time to time. This means that external AI engines may be used, which means that sensitive data (such as confidential information) should not be entered in prompts, but only pure legal data queries, such as requesting the drafting of a memo/legal research on a certain issue. However, IST Legal cannot be held responsible if the technology is used in violation of these guidelines.
faq.a12: IST Legal's professional platform has features to use a local AI engine when processing classified data, enabling the handling of such data with AI technology. Please contact IST Legal for further details on how its professional platform has been designed for adherance to strict customer guidelines on AI usage.
faq.q2: What type of data is used in IST Legal platform ?
faq.a2: The platform is entirely based on public legal data. In IST Legal's professional platform, it is possible to add your own data sets that complement the public legal data.
faq.q3: How secure is the IST Legal AI platform ?
faq.a3: Our platform employs enterprise-grade security measures, including end-to-end encryption, secure data storage, and regular security audits. We comply with international data protection standards and ensure your legal documents remain confidential.
faq.q4: What types of legal documents can the AI process ?
faq.a4: Our AI can process a wide range of legal documents including contracts, agreements, court documents, legal research materials, and regulatory compliance documents. The system is trained on diverse legal texts and can handle multiple languages and jurisdictions.
faq.q5: Is training provided for new users ?
faq.a5: Yes, we provide comprehensive training for all new users. This includes video tutorials, documentation, live webinars, and one-on-one support sessions. Our customer success team is also available to help you maximize the platform's benefits.
faq.q6: Can the system be customized for specific legal practices ?
faq.a6: Absolutely! Our AI platform can be customized to match your specific legal practice areas and workflows. We can adapt the system to your firm's terminology, document templates, and specific legal requirements.
faq.q7: What kind of support is available ?
faq.a7: We offer 24/7 technical support through multiple channels including email, phone, and live chat. Our support team includes legal technology experts who understand both the technical and legal aspects of the platform.
faq.q8: How often is the AI system updated ?
faq.a8: Our AI system receives regular updates to improve accuracy, add new features, and incorporate the latest legal developments. Updates are automatically deployed and include both performance improvements and new capabilities based on user feedback.

features.title: Features
features.desc-one: It helps with the efficient review of legal documents and contracts by rapidly analyzing and pinpointing crucial clauses, terms, and potential risks, providing recommendations, and generating summaries of extensive legal documents for faster decision-making.
features.desc-two: We analyze historical case data to predict legal outcomes and risks, empowering legal teams with data-driven insights. Our platform enhances decision-making by forecasting results, identifying patterns, and mitigating risks. It also streamlines client interactions with tailored recommendations for more strategic legal planning.
features.desc-three: Contextual Case Law Search identifies relevant case precedents and legal opinions based on specific contexts, providing real-time statutory updates that track legal changes across jurisdictions. This ensures compliance and empowers legal professionals with up-to-date insights.

qura.header: Foyen's AI Success Story with Qura and IST Legal - now available to all

items.body: After trying several AI products, Foyen decided to move forward only with Qura and IST Legal, which they have rolled out across the entire firm of nearly 100 practitioners.
items.quote: “Using Qura as the new generation of search engines to efficiently retrieve necessary sources for extended legal research and quickly verify generative AI output has created an unbeatable combination with IST Legal's Generative AI platform. Going back to a traditional legal workflow is simply not an option.”

items.body: The IST Legal platform, which started as an internal GenAI project, worked so well that Foyen decided to move the platform to IST Legal, an independent company, which will launch to the entire Nordic legal market.
items.quote: Urubuga rwa IST Legal platform, rwatangiye nk’ umushinga w’ imbere wa GenAI, wakoze neza ku buryo Foyen yahisemo kwimurira urubuga muri IST Legal, isosiyete yigenga, izatangiza isoko ry’ amategeko yose ya Nordic.
items.citee: - Richard Sahlberg, partner at Foyen and CEO at IST Legal

items.body: Inspired by Foyen's AI success in combining the two tools, Qura and IST Legal will now enter into a partnership allowing overlapping customers to easily use both products together to create a powerful AI toolkit.
items.quote: “We have seen many GenAI platforms, and the IST Legal platform stands out. Foyen has demonstrated the value in combining Qura with the IST Legal platform, which this partnership aims to bring to a broader audience.”

qura.conclusion: More information about this partnership will be communicated to Qura's and IST Legal's customers.
